content: I was born. This day signal dark period in history begin
Study at No1 Primary school- Cam Lo town. At this time I have a close friend until now
Play chess, unbeaten with same age group
Study at Tran Hung Dao Secondary school- Cam Lo town
This time I make most friends until now
Entrance exam for Cam Lo high school
Reason I exam for this school because I like to stay near my home ( Actually I failed specialized chemistry)
Begin a new journey. Study at Da Nang University of technology.
